Room.Name: Back Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the back alley of a large shopping complex.
Room.LongDescription: The alley is very dark and really smells bad. As you walk along, you stumble over drunks and knock down their make-shift houses of discarded tree bark. You're not sure anything could survive down here, but then again,you're not sure you'd want to meet anything that could.
